code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import"./Blog.scss";import BlogCard from"../../components/blogCard/BlogCard";import{blogSection}from"../../portfolio";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import StyleContext from"../../contexts/StyleContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Blogs(){var _useContext=useContext(StyleContext),isDark=_useContext.isDark;if(!blogSection.display){return null;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:1000,distance:"20px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main",id:"blogs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"blog-header-text",children:blogSection.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:isDark?"dark-mode blog-subtitle":"subTitle blog-subtitle",children:blogSection.subtitle})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-main-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-text-div",children:blogSection.blogs.map(function(blog,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BlogCard,{isDark:isDark,blog:{url:blog.url,image:blog.image,title:blog.title,description:blog.description}},i);})})})]})});}
